item.title: How to use Markdown
item.description: How to use Markdown The quick and easy way to format web pages Link URL link http://www.example.com <http://www.example.com> Email link address@example.com <address@example.com> Text link This is an example link. This is an [example link](http://example.com/). Bold and italic text one asterisk on each end makes the text italic *one asterisk on each end makes the text italic* two asterisks on each end makes text bold **two asterisks on each end makes text bold** three asterisk on each end makes text bold and italic
